Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the serializer should ignore any unrecognized type discriminator IDs and revert to the contract of the base type.
Docs.value: to instruct the deserializer to ignore any unrecognized type discriminator IDs and revert to the contract of the base type; to fail the deserialization for unrecognized type discriminator IDs.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonPolymorphicTypeConfiguration> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
